title: Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram: A Symphony of Sparkle
materials: Finest quality diamonds totaling 6.01 carats (162 stones)
0.95 carats (31 stones) and 1.55 carats (15 stones). The necklace is meticulously crafted in a hypoallergenic white metal alloy
lasting shine. Each diamond is expertly set for maximum brilliance.
features: This stunning five-strand Haaram features a delicate floral design rendered entirely in dazzling diamonds. The graduating lengths of the strands create a captivating cascade effect. The intricate design showcases flower and droplet motifs connected by dainty diamond links. A modern take on a classic South Indian design, making it versatile for both traditional and contemporary occasions.
colors: thanks to the brilliance of the diamonds and the bright white metal setting.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and milestone birthdays. Also suitable for upscale modern events and parties where you want to make a sophisticated statement.
description: This exquisite diamond Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and exceptional craftsmanship. The cascading design and floral motifs create a breathtaking visual impact. It is designed for comfort and durability, ensuring it will remain a cherished heirloom for generations. Its modern interpretation of the traditional Haaram style allows for versatile wear.
